page.title: 12Local History,Kinross Area
page.content: {The Market Park.}The recent arrival of the Sunday Market (in the premises of Kinross Motor Auctions just outside the study area) is a reminder of the days when the Market Park,opposite the Green Hotel,was the site for 3 annual fairs.These were the March Fair,the Apple Market,so called because of the large quantities of apples sold,and the Jooley Fair.The last of these was the year's main event where cattle were sold and people were entertained at side shows such as boxing or bought items at the stalls.The Fairs dwindled and eventually stopped in 1977. Refer also to page 20.
